title: Newly Renovated Cozy One Bedroom Apartment
posting_body: ['Why go all the way to Jersey when you can have a spacious cozy apartment in central Staten Island that is just 35 minutes bus away from Downtown Manhattan?', 'Newly Renovated One Bedroom Apartment Unit in Legal Two-Family Home situated in a quite dead end street in the center of Richmond Shopping Center and near all public schools and public transportation - -750', 'sq ft Rent $1650 include water.', 'Does not include Electricity -Gas tenants have their own meters for electricity and gas.', 'NO BROKER FEE $3,300 Up Front =', "1st Month's Rent & + 100 % REFUNDABLE Security Deposit (Post Move-Out Walkthrough) -Flexible", 'Move-In Date Patiently Awaiting AS LONG AS IT TAKES for a Highly Qualified/VERIFIED Tenant (Must have excellent credit score).', 'Newly renovated with fresh paint, new appliances, new kitchen sink, new blinds, new screens, new storm door, lighting fixtures, toilet, bathroom fixtures, etc. - -Deep-Cleaned Professionally - -1 Bedroom -1 Bath (w/ shower, and tub) -Open-Concept Kitchen/Living/ Dining Space - -Full-Sized Kitchen Appliances -No dishwasher at this time -2 large Windows walk in closet - -Unrestricted Street Parking (in front of the house, dead-end road) - Local Laundromat 1 mile away.', 'No on-site laundry access at this time.', 'Con Edison: -Electricity; National Grid- Gas; -Heat/Cool (central AC) .', "The Rental is: LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION : 0.3 mile 5 minutes walking distance to PS 58 Space Shuttle Columbia School, CSI High School for International Studies, Gaynor McCown Expeditionary Learning School, 0.3 mile 7 minutes walking distance to Staten Island Shopping Mall (Macy's, JC Penny, Movie Theater, etc.); 0.3 miles central bus station to S79, S59, S78, SIM4 (express bus during rush hour), SIM4C. 2.3 miles to Willowbrook Park.", "1.5 miles to Costco's.", '0.9 miles to La Tourette Golf Course.', '1.9 miles to College of Staten Island.', "-Level 1 ~NO FEE~ Owner's Pre-Application Digital Survey Required Prior To Viewing -Level 2 $55 per applicant, paid directly to TURBO TENANT for Formal Application w/Substantiating Documentation Level 3: ~No Additional Fees~ Property Manager or Landlord Reference Call"]
